Docs.summary: Defines the polling modes for the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The SelectMode enumeration defines the polling modes that can be passed to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method. Use the SelectRead value to determine if a listening <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> has incoming connection requests. Use the SelectWrite value to determine if a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is writeable. Use the SelectError value to determine if there is an error condition present on the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>. For explanations of writeability, readability, and the presence of error conditions, see the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
## Examples The following example checks the status of a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> using all three SelectMode enumeration values. A call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A> using the SelectWrite enumerated value should return `true`.
